start.text:
Hello, I am Tara! 
 I am your DIKSHA guide 
 Please select your preference from the options I provide or type your query directly.

Which state board do you belong to?

Creative and Critical Thinking aims to ensure that students engage with interesting higher order competency questions and develop the skills of problem solving and critical thinking. You can click on the link below to access this week's questions  
  Please visit: https://diksha.gov.in/play/collection/do_31290608850520473612338?contentType=TextBook&utm_source=Tara
